{0} has performed a role reversal.

You are now the main user and have additional setting options (Employees / Access / Manage authorizations).

Name: Rollentausch.Schritt_1.Beschreibung
E:
Please select an employee who has already been entered for the role swap. The employee receives all your rights and becomes the main user. You and the previously entered employees are now subordinate to them.

The main user can cancel the role swap at any time. You will be logged out after the role swap.

Name: Zusatzdaten_SIX!FZL50.Hilfe

E: Termination benefits at date of marriage

Name: Zusatzdaten_SIX!FZLHeirat.Hilfe
E: At the time of marriage, the vested benefits are calculated and recorded according to law. In the event of a divorce, this value is required as a benchmark for calculating the termination benefit to be divided.

Name: Zusatzdaten_SIX!Pfand.Hilfe
E: The insured person can pledge their entitlement to pension benefits or an amount up to the amount of their vested benefits in order to benefit from better financing conditions.
